html: (25) Whom the Lord of hosts shall bless . . .—In this tripartite holy alliance Israel is to retain the spiritual supremacy. Egypt, once alien, becomes the people of the Lord. (Comp.Hosea 1:9-10 .) Assyria is recognised as the instrument which He has made to do His work (comp.Isaiah 10:15 ;Isaiah 37:26); but Israel has the proud pre-eminence of being His “inheritance.”
